results.title: Stress/catecholamine-induced cardiac necrosis. Reduction by beta 1-selective blockade.
results.text_hl: The study involved 114 hemodynamically stable @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with acute @<m>DISEASE_Craniocerebral_Trauma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006259 @@@head injury@@@ who were randomized, double blind, to either placebo or @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ given intravenously (10 mg every six hours) for three days and then orally (100 mg once a day) for four days.

citations.NLM: Cruickshank JM, Neil-Dwyer G, Hayes Y, Degaute JP, Kuurne T, Kytta J, Carruthers ME, Patel S. Stress/catecholamine-induced cardiac necrosis. Reduction by beta 1-selective blockade. Postgrad Med. 1988 Feb 29;Spec No():140-7. PMID: 2831524
citations.BibTeX: @article{2831524, title={Stress/catecholamine-induced cardiac necrosis. Reduction by beta 1-selective blockade.}, author={Cruickshank JM and Neil-Dwyer G and Hayes Y and Degaute JP and Kuurne T and Kytta J and Carruthers ME and Patel S}, journal={Postgrad Med}, volume={Spec No}, pages={140-7}}

results.title: Reduction of stress/catecholamine-induced cardiac necrosis by beta 1-selective blockade.
results.text_hl: 114 haemodynamically stable @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with acute @<m>DISEASE_Craniocerebral_Trauma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006259 @@@head injury@@@ were randomised, double-blind, to either placebo or @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ given intravenously (10 mg every 6 h) for 3 days then orally (100 mg daily) for a further 4 days.

citations.NLM: Cruickshank JM, Neil-Dwyer G, Degaute JP, Hayes Y, Kuurne T, Kytta J, Vincent JL, Carruthers ME, Patel S. Reduction of stress/catecholamine-induced cardiac necrosis by beta 1-selective blockade. Lancet. 1987 Sep 12;2(8559):585-9. PMID: 2887885
citations.BibTeX: @article{2887885, title={Reduction of stress/catecholamine-induced cardiac necrosis by beta 1-selective blockade.}, author={Cruickshank JM and Neil-Dwyer G and Degaute JP and Hayes Y and Kuurne T and Kytta J and Vincent JL and Carruthers ME and Patel S}, journal={Lancet}, volume={2}, number={8559}, pages={585-9}}
